mapper.insert: INSERT INTO G_RECORD (USER_ID, GENERATE_SEQ, ROOT_PATH, INPUT_IMG_DIR, INPUT_IMG_NAME, NEW_INPUT_IMG_NAME, GENERATED_IMG_DIR, GENERATED_IMG_NAME, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT) VALUES ( #{userId}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.GENERATE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM G_RECORD A WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}), #{rootPath}, #{inputImgDir}, #{inputImgName}, #{newInputImgName}, #{generatedImgDir}, #{generatedImgName}, #{regId}, NOW(), #{chgId}, NOW())
